title: Saudi govt reopens Masjid-e-Nabvi for public today
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 31 (APP):The Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA) government has reopened Masjid-e-Nabvi for public on Monday (today).
According to a private news channel the faithfuls offered Fajr prayer in the mosque with strict compliance of the precautionary measures to prevent the spread of corona-virus.
Strict precautionary measures including limiting the congregation to 40 percent of the mosqueâ€™s capacity at a time are being observed.
The mosques in other cities of Saudi Arabia have also been opened for offering prayers.
